attributes.action: Stop IVF postcode lottery. Give everyone a chance to have IVF on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Fertility fairness shows the areas where funding is available, and whether having children within the family will affect you 

http://www.fertilityfairness.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/FF-spreadsheet-2017-Website-Final.xlsx
attributes.background: The NHS currently offer IVF to couples depending on where they live. People are being refused IVF funding if they live in certain areas even if they have no children. Give everyone the chance to be a parent if they have no biological children despite where they live. Stop the IVF postcode lottery.
